author: Buddha
message: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
title: Thought of the day

message: Don't focus on making the right decision, focus on making the decision the right one.
title: Thought of the day

author: Wayne Dyer
message: Everything is perfect in the universe even your desire to improve it.
title: Thought of the day

author: Eden Phillpotts
message: The universe is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
title: Thought of the day
